neighbors.name: Casa Grande West et al
neighbors.claims: Casa Grande West et al is listed as the owner of two undeveloped parcels in Pinal County (indicating multiple co-owners) ([csassets.com](https://csassets.com/portfolio/detail/vacant-land-in-pinal-county-az/#:~:text=0,39%2C%202013%20plus%20interest)). The name corresponds to an old subdivision called “Casa Grande West,” suggesting this is an ownership group or land trust rather than a single person ([csassets.com](https://csassets.com/portfolio/detail/vacant-land-in-pinal-county-az/#:~:text=0,39%2C%202013%20plus%20interest)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Identify the principals behind this ownership via title records and reach out through formal channels (e.g., their registered agent or broker), as direct personal contact is not readily available.

neighbors.name: Timothy A. & Evelyn P. Robinson
neighbors.claims: Timothy A. Robinson and his wife Evelyn P. Robinson jointly own a rural parcel west of Casa Grande (Pinal County APN 411-07-001H) ([rogue.casagrandeaz.gov](https://rogue.casagrandeaz.gov/arcgis/rest/services/Pinal_County/Pinal_County_Parcels/MapServer/0#:~:text=,alias%3A%20PSTLZIP4%2C%20length%3A%204)). The parcel is zoned “General Rural” in Pinal County, indicating it’s used for farming or low-density rural purposes ([www.compass.com](https://www.compass.com/listing/25586-west-maricopa-casa-grande-highway-unit-16-casa-grande-az-85193/1775997752460531137/#:~:text=install%20well%20,Drive%20by%20and%20walk%20the)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Robinsons through a familiar community figure (for example, a local farm bureau representative) to discuss the project’s effects on farmland and rural lifestyle in a personal, respectful conversation.

overview_summary: None of the profiled neighbors have a clear public stance on the proposed development (0 support, 0 oppose; all are classified as "unknown" stance). Both identified neighbors appear to have limited public profiles and no formal community leadership roles, suggesting no high-influence individuals among them.
